label: uncl3403
comment: Code specifying the type of name.

values.label: Maiden name
values.comment: Family name of person before marriage.

values.label: Used name
values.comment: Name used to identify an entity.

values.label: Call name
values.comment: Name used to identify a person in a particular context.

values.label: Official name
values.comment: The name as registered by official authorities.

values.label: Franchise name
values.comment: Name of an entity authorized by a company to sell its goods or services in a particular way.

values.label: Party acronym
values.comment: A name formed from the initial letters of other words.

values.label: Doing business as
values.comment: To specify the name under which the party is conducting business.

values.label: Brand name
values.comment: A name legally registered as a trademark.

values.label: Primary name
values.comment: Identifies the name of first importance.
